price: (13) What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allāh [due] grandeur
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
